Package org.texgen.gui

Visual UI classes for displaying textures.

To get started with displaying a texture, just use :
TextureViewer.show(new TextureClass(),500,500,"My Texture");

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
RenderListener Object simplementing this interface can be notified of any updates in the rendering process.
 

Class Summary
RenderThread  
TextureImage Base class for rendering textures, managing the image and allowing the image to be saved.
TexturePanel Swing JPanel that uses a TextureImage to provide the image displayed in the panel
TextureViewer Helper class that quickly instantiates a TextureWindow and sets the texture to the texture parameter to let the user easily see results.
TextureWindow Window class that renders the texture onto a panel with options for aliasing and fast rendering.
 

Package org.texgen.gui Description

Visual UI classes for displaying textures.

To get started with displaying a texture, just use :
TextureViewer.show(new TextureClass(),500,500,"My Texture");
